name: src/parallax.mjs
logger
description: The logger module this module uses to log errors / logs

name: instances
description: An array of instances that use the parallax system.

name: instanceWeakMap
description: Weakmap to store info on instances used in this module.

name: add
description:
Adds an instance to the parallax system.
Call this first and then add your instance to the map.

params.name: pInstance
params.description: The instance to add to the parallax system.

params.name: pParallaxInfo
params.description: The parallax info that tells this module how to control this instance.

params.name: pX
params.description: The x position this instance will start at.

params.name: pY
params.description: The y position this instance will start at.

params.name: pMap
params.description: The map this instance will start at.

properties.name: pParallaxInfo.x
properties.description: The x multiplier for this instance. Controls how fast or slow this instance moves. -Infinity to Infinity. 1 to move with camera.

properties.name: pParallaxInfo.y
properties.description: The y multiplier for this instance. Controls how fast or slow this instance moves. -Infinity to Infinity. 1 to move with camera.

properties.name: pParallaxInfo.loop
properties.description: Whether this instance will loop endlessly.

params.name: pParallaxInfo
params.description: The parallax info that tells this module how to control this instance.

params.name: pX
params.description: The x position this parallax will start at.

params.name: pY
params.description: The y position this parallax will start at.

params.name: pMap
params.description: The map this instance will start at.

properties.name: pParallaxInfo.x
properties.description: The x multiplier for this instance. Controls how fast or slow this instance moves. -Infinity to Infinity. 1 to move with camera.

properties.name: pParallaxInfo.y
properties.description: The y multiplier for this instance. Controls how fast or slow this instance moves. -Infinity to Infinity. 1 to move with camera.

properties.name: pParallaxInfo.loop
properties.description: Whether this instance will loop endlessly.

name: remove
description: Removes an instance to the parallax system.

params.name: pInstance
params.description: The instance to remove to the parallax system.

params.name: pCameraX
params.description: The x position of the camera.

params.name: pCameraY
params.description: The y position of the camera.

content:
# Parallax
A parallax module that will enable effortless integration of depth effects into your game.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "parallax",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "A parallax module that will enable effortless integration of depth effects into your game.",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "build": "npx webpack && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js",
    "build:minify": "uglifyjs dist/parallax.min.mjs -m -c --comments -o dist/parallax.min.mjs",
    "build:prod": "npx webpack --mode production && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js && npm run build:docs",
    "build:docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "https://github.com/doubleactii",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE.md",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/EvitcaStudio/Parallax"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "uglify-js": "^3.17.4",
    "webpack": "^5.90.3",
    "webpack-cli": "^5.1.4"
  }
}
name: package.json
